title: Urban Energy Acupuncture: Iteration No. 01: Times Square
author: Callender; Ian; Akhavan; Benjamin
cleaned_text: Square [Ian Callender](javascript:;), Ian Callender is an artist and designer exploring the intersection of the built environment and digital technologies. His work challenges traditional dialectical oppositions of structured/organic, form/un-form, and digital/literal. His work has been recognized by the Media Architecture Institute, Architizer, iF, Core77, and the Art Directors Club, and he has been exhibited internationally. [Benjamin Akhavan](javascript:;) Benjamin Akhavan is a multidisciplinary designer, educator, and the founding principal of FOAWM, a nondescript Firm/Office/Atelier/Workshop/Milieu with polyvalent interests at the intersection of architecture and urbanism. He holds degrees from the Spitzer School of Architecture at The City College of New York and Columbia University GSAPP.
